welcome.title: Welcome to Portfolio Management System
welcome.subtitle: Your comprehensive solution for tracking investments, managing portfolios, and analyzing performance with real-time data and advanced analytics.

step1.title: Create Your First Portfolio
step1.description: Start by creating a new portfolio to organize your investments. This will be your main workspace for tracking performance and managing assets.

step2.title: Add Your First Trade
step2.description: Record your first buy or sell transaction. The system will automatically calculate your position and track your performance.

step3.title: Manage Your Assets
step3.description: Add and organize your investment assets. Track stocks, bonds, gold, deposits, and other investment instruments.

step4.title: View Your Dashboard
step4.description: Monitor your portfolio performance with real-time analytics, charts, and comprehensive reporting tools.

footer.message: Ready to start managing your investments? Choose your next step below.

quickStartGuide.subtitle: Follow these simple steps to get started with your portfolio management

completion.title: Congratulations! 🎉
completion.message: You've completed all the setup steps. Your portfolio management system is ready to use!

createPortfolio.title: Create Your First Portfolio
createPortfolio.description: Start by creating a new portfolio to organize your investments. This will be your main workspace for tracking performance and managing assets.

addCashFlow.title: Add Cash Flow Source
addCashFlow.description: Set up your initial cash flow source to fund your portfolio. This could be salary, savings, or other income streams.

addTrade.title: Add Your First Trade
addTrade.description: Record your first buy or sell transaction. The system will automatically calculate your position and track your performance.

manageAssets.title: Manage Your Assets
manageAssets.description: Add and organize your investment assets. Track stocks, bonds, gold, deposits, and other investment instruments.

viewDashboard.title: View Your Dashboard
viewDashboard.description: Monitor your portfolio performance with real-time analytics, charts, and comprehensive reporting tools.

permissions.title: Manage Portfolio Permissions
permissions.transferCreatorWarning: ⚠️ WARNING: This is a critical action!
permissions.transferCreatorWarningMessage: You are transferring portfolio ownership to another person. After transfer, you will lose ownership and cannot see this portfolio anymore. This action cannot be undone!
permissions.confirmRemoveDescription: Are you sure you want to remove this permission? This action cannot be undone.
permissions.noPermissions: No permissions set for this portfolio
permissions.noPermissionsDescription: Add accounts to share access to this portfolio

deviceManagement.title: Trusted Devices
deviceManagement.subtitle: Manage devices that can access your account without password

noDevices.title: No Trusted Devices
noDevices.subtitle: Devices will be automatically added when you log in

revokeDevice.title: Revoke Device
revokeDevice.message: Are you sure you want to revoke this device? You will need to enter your password the next time you log in from this device.

revokeAll.title: Revoke All Devices
revokeAll.warning: This will revoke all trusted devices. You will need to enter your password the next time you log in from any device.
revokeAll.message: Are you sure you want to revoke all {{count}} devices?

forgetPassword.title: Forgot Password
forgetPassword.subtitle: Enter your email to contact admin for support

contactAdmin.title: Contact Admin
contactAdmin.description: If you forgot your password, please contact admin for support

modal.title: Contact Admin
modal.description: This feature is under development. Please contact admin via email below for the fastest support.
modal.success: Message sent successfully! Admin will contact you back as soon as possible.
